update laboratory_base set org_name=#{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dependent_unit=#{dependentUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_name_desc=#{orgNameDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, laboratory_director=#{laboratoryDirector,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, director_desc=#{directorDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, plan_desc=#{planDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, achievement_desc=#{achievementDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, achievement_transformation=#{achievementTransformation,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, sys_flag=#{sysFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_order=#{dataOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, del_flag=#{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date=#{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user=#{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_disp=#{createUserDisp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_date=#{modifyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_user=#{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_user_disp=#{modifyUserDisp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status=#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_status=#{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user=#{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date=#{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak1=#{bak1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak2=#{bak2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak3=#{bak3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak4=#{bak4,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where data_id = #{dataId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select data_id, org_name, dependent_unit, org_name_desc, laboratory_director, director_desc, plan_desc, achievement_desc, achievement_transformation, sys_flag, data_order, del_flag, create_date, create_user, create_user_disp, modify_date, modify_user, modify_user_disp, status, audit_status, update_user, update_date, bak1, bak2, bak3, bak4 from laboratory_base where 1=1
and data_id like '%${dataId}%'
and org_name like '%${orgName}%'
and dependent_unit like '%${dependentUnit}%'
and org_name_desc like '%${orgNameDesc}%'
and laboratory_director like '%${laboratoryDirector}%'
and director_desc like '%${directorDesc}%'
and plan_desc like '%${planDesc}%'
and achievement_desc like '%${achievementDesc}%'
and achievement_transformation like '%${achievementTransformation}%'
and sys_flag like '%${sysFlag}%'
and data_order like '%${dataOrder}%'
and del_flag like '%${delFlag}%'
and create_date like '%${createDate}%'
and create_user like '%${createUser}%'
and create_user_disp like '%${createUserDisp}%'
and modify_date like '%${modifyDate}%'
and modify_user like '%${modifyUser}%'
and modify_user_disp like '%${modifyUserDisp}%'
and status like '%${status}%'
and audit_status like '%${auditStatus}%'
and update_user like '%${updateUser}%'
and update_date like '%${updateDate}%'
and bak1 like '%${bak1}%'
and bak2 like '%${bak2}%'
and bak3 like '%${bak3}%'
and bak4 like '%${bak4}%'
order by ${iSortCol} ${sSortDir_0}
